versions.updateLog:
- Added a link to privacy policy page in settings
- In the fault finder page, the search text and the scroll position are now saved when the user check out a fault code. So users don't have to search or scroll again and can continue from where they left off
- Minor bug fixes

- Added news and update log
- Added update alert
- Added version display in settings
- Added missing fault codes for the SINAMICS DCM

- Added more devices
- Categorized devices
- Added a button to open internet link to devices that have a website
- Added a button to show manuals relating to the device
- Users can now change text size in settings
- Updated setting UIs to be more user friendly
- Fixed minor UIs bugs
